freshsales_create_contact.description: Add new contact in Freshsales CRM

props.name: first_name
props.description: First name of the contact

props.name: last_name
props.description: Last name of the contact

props.name: job_title
props.description: Designation of the contact in the account they belong to

props.name: email
props.description: Primary email address of the contact

props.name: work_number
props.description: Work phone number of the contact

props.name: mobile_number
props.description: Mobile phone number of the contact

props.name: address
props.description: Address of the contact

props.name: city
props.description: City that the contact belongs to

props.name: state
props.description: State that the contact belongs to

props.name: zipcode
props.description: Zipcode of the region that the contact belongs to

props.name: country
props.description: Country that the contact belongs to

props.name: territory_id
props.description: ID of the territory that the contact belongs to

props.name: owner_id
props.description: ID of the user to whom the contact has been assigned

props.name: subscription_status
props.description: Status of subscription that the contact is in.

props.name: medium
props.description: The medium that led your contact to your website/web app

props.name: campaign_id
props.description: The campaign that led your contact to your web app.

props.name: keyword
props.description: The keywords that the contact used to reach your website/web app

props.name: time_zone
props.description: Timezone that the contact belongs to

props.name: facebook
props.description: Facebook username of the contact

props.name: twitter
props.description: Twitter username of the contact

props.name: linkedin
props.description: LinkedIn account of the contact

props.name: contact_status_id
props.description: ID of the contact status that the contact belongs to

props.name: sales_account_id
props.description: ID of the primary account that the contact belongs to
